page.title: 14GOLDTHORPE MARKET
page.content: Goldthorpe market starts at 8.30 am. on{Tuesdays and Saturdays.}Some stallholders come at about 7.30am. Tuesdays not many people bother to come, but lots of people come on Saturdays. Some stallholders come casually, some come every market day. There are{62 stalls}on the market which is surrounded by mesh fencing and barbed wire on the top. There are {food stalls, clothes stalls, toy {stalls and Bric a Brac stalls. }My Uncle Raymond has a stall, it is a 50p stall. He gets his things to sell from a{warehouse.}He has lots of customers, Tuesdays about 150, Saturdays about 500. He has a big blue van to carry his things in and parks it outside the market. The market on Tuesday finishes at 1.00 pm. but Saturday is an all day market.
